boardgame.name: Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t Mess with Cthulhu
No Touch Kraken
TimeBomb
boardgame.description: Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t Mess with Cthulhu is a social deduction game with secret identities. Players are either Investigators trying to keep Cthulhu from waking and controlling the world, or Cultists that want to bring the world to a disturbing end._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game takes place over four rounds. The Investigators must uncover all the Elder Signs to win; the Cultists win when Cthulhu is revealed or if the game ends before all the Elder Signs are discovered._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Before each round players receive a number of Investigation cards, which they look at but then shuffle and put in front of themselves so they know what cards they have, but they don't know which card is which. Each round has a number of actions equal to the number of players in the game. Players take actions to reveal Investigation cards, and gather all unrevealed cards are shuffled an redistributed evenly among the players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reveal Cthulhu, and the Cultists win instantly. Reveal all the Elder Signs, and the Investigators win. If you want to play multiple rounds (it's highly recommended), the losers in each game get Insanity tokens. Get three tokens, and the night is over with the winner(s) being those most sane._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Kickstarter version notes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Kickstarter Edition has the following bonuses, unavailable in the retail version:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;#1 - 10 player aupport. All the components needed to play with up to 10 people at the same time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;#2 - 3 x Necronomicon Investigation cards. Now the Investigators not only have to discover all the Elder Signs in time to prevent Cthulhu from rising, they must also discover the ancient tomes called Necronomicon. But the Necronomicon are dangerous to the uninitiated and cannot be revealed until at least one Elder Sign has been discovered._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;These promo cards add more information into the game, helping the Investigators in their quest. However the Necronomicon also give the Cultists another win condition - making the strategies more complex and the discussion even more lively._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;#3 - 6 x _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Objects of Power_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards. These special cards have a variety of different uses, and provide more direct and indirect information in the game (as well as a touch of light-hearted fun). Objects of Power give the game more replay value, more strategy and more variability without adding complexity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Timebomb Themed edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In TimeBomb, you are playing either a terrorist trying to make a bomb blow up, or a SWAT team member trying to defuse it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player receives a card at the beginning of the game that indicates his role and keep it secret until the end of the game. Then, at each of the game's 4 rounds, each player receives 5 cards that he shuffles after having a quick look at them and place them face down in front of him. Among all of the player's cards, a number of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;SUCCESS_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards, one _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;BOOM_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card and the rest being _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;SAFE_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The active player then chooses another's player card and reveals it, that player then becoming the new active player. After N cards have been revealed (N being the number of players), all cards are shuffled again and distributed equally to the players for a new round. If at any time the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;BOOM_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card is revealed, the terrorist's team wins. If all _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;SUCCESS_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards are revealed before that happens, then the SWAT team members win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will you be able to convince the other player to reveal your own cards among them a SUCCESS is hidden ? Or are you just trying to cheat the SWAT team members into revealing your own cards because the BOOM card is among them ? Only a game of TimeBomb will say._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: 新ボードゲーム党 (New Board Game Party)

***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t Mess With Cthulhu is expected to ship from the publisher in Q3, 2016. This listing is for a Kickstarter Edition of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t Mess With Cthulhu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; - the English language edition of TimeBomb that was Kickstarted by Indie Boards and Cards. The Kickstarter Edition includes the following extras not found in the retail edition of the game: Achieved Promo #1 - 8 player expansion! Achieved Promo #2 - Necronomicon! Achieved Promo #3 - _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Objects of Power_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; We do not yet know the shipping weight for this game, so shipping charges will be determined when the game arrives from the publishers. GLGames uses the lowest cost shipping option available, with no handling fees of any kind. Please contact us if you have any questions.

The game: (c) 2015. English, German, French and Japanese rules included! All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

Kickstarter Edition Has the following bonuses, unavailable in the retail version: • 10 player support. All the components needed to play with up to 10 people at the same time. • 3 x Necronomicon Investigation cards. Now the Investigators not only have to discover all the Elder Signs in time to prevent Cthulhu from rising, they must also discover the ancient tomes called Necronomicon. But the Necronomicon are dangerous to the uninitiated and cannot be revealed until at least one Elder Sign has been discovered. These promo cards add more information into the game, helping the Investigators in their quest. However the Necronomicon also give the Cultists another win condition - making the strategies more complex and the discussion even more lively. • 6 x _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Objects of Power_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cards. These special cards have a variety of different uses, and provide more direct and indirect information in the game (as well as a touch of light-hearted fun). Objects of Power give the game more replay value, more strategy and more variability without adding complexity. Brand new in shrink
